sourcesContent:
<template>
  <AuthView v-if="logged === false" />
  <AppView v-if="logged === true" />
</template>

<script>
import AuthView from "@/components/AuthView.vue";
import AppView from "@/components/AppView";
import firebase from 'firebase';
import axios from "axios";
import M from "materialize-css";


export default {
  name: 'App',
  computed: {
    console: () => console
  },
  components: {
    AppView,
    AuthView,
  },
  methods: {
    async registerUs() {
      let email = document.getElementById('registerEmail').value;
      let password = document.getElementById('registerPassword').value;
      let retypePassword = document.getElementById('retypePassword').value;
      if (password === retypePassword) {
        await axios.post(this.backend_url.concat('/client/create'), {
          email: email,
          password: password
        }).then((response) => {
          if (response.data === 'User created') {
            M.toast({html: 'Account has been created ', classes: 'rounded green', displayLength: 2000});
            this.changeForm('toLogin');
          } else
            M.toast({html: response.data, classes: 'rounded red', displayLength: 2000});
        }).catch((error) => {
          M.toast({html: error, classes: 'rounded red', displayLength: 2000});
        });
      }
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      appView: false,
      loginView: true,
      fb: firebase,
      logged: false,
      backend_url: 'http://127.0.0.1:5000',
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style>
body {
  background-image: url('assets/azure-6.jpg');
}
</style>
